{"id":1593821084,"question_id":3765,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"7 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1743560079,"status":15,"status_display":"Runtime Error","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1593821084/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Cost to Divide Array Into Subarrays","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<int> pref, costPref;\n    vector<vector<int>> memo;\n    int N, K;\n\n    int dp(int st, int en) {\n        if (en == N)\n            return (st == N ? 0 : INT_MAX);\n        if (memo[st][en] != -1)\n            return memo[st][en];\n\n        // case 1: take next element\n        // dp(st, en+1);\n        int exp = dp(st, en+1);\n\n        // case 2: make into subarray\n        // dp(en+1, en+1);\n        int costSuf = costPref[N] - costPref[st];\n        int nums = pref[en+1] - pref[st];\n        int grp = (nums + K) * costSuf;\n        \n        int next = dp(en+1, en+1);\n        grp = (next == INT_MAX ? INT_MAX : grp + next);\n\n        return memo[st][en] = min(exp, grp);\n    }\n\n    long long minimumCost(vector<int>& nums, vector<int>& cost, int k) {\n        N = (int)nums.size(), K = k;\n        pref = vector<int> (N+1, 0); \n        costPref = vector<int> (N+1, 0); \n        \n        for (int i=0; i<N; i++) {\n            pref[i+1] += pref[i] + nums[i];\n            costPref[i+1] += costPref[i] + cost[i];\n        }\n\n        memo = vector<vector<int>> (N+1, vector<int> (N+1, -1));\n        return dp(0, 0);\n    }\n};\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-cost-to-divide-array-into-subarrays","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":1096}
